page.title: 20THE AREA IN GENERAL
page.content:
This is a quiet area,although it has one of the most busy roads going through it:the A27.Stanmer Park is very big and used for several recreational games,or sports,e.g: football,cricket,tennis,etc.Wild Park is also very large,and is used very much the same as Wild Park,but Wild Park does not have a church,a village or a farm,as Stanmer does.Although it is a quiet area at the moment,it may not be for much longer,as the proposed Brighton By pass may be built,running through the middle of the south downs. Coldean is the only housing estate in the area,an is not very large although there is two schools there. By Gary Christer.
All computer work by,and supervised by Gary Christer.
